title: Confirm News demo mode and API key security posture
constraints: Frontend must not request, store, or log any external news API keys; user-facing UI must not prompt for API keys.
Demo/placeholder News data must remain the default data source until explicitly switched via centralized frontend configuration.
Keep architecture modular so real news API integration can be enabled later via secure backend settings/integrations (no frontend-provided keys).
Respect Internet Computer single-actor backend architecture (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo); only add backend/migration.mo if state migration is required.

Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Implementing or enabling real external news fetching in the UI right now (demo/placeholder only).
Adding any UI screens or prompts for entering API keys.
Introducing any external databases or third-party auth providers beyond Internet Identity.
